whyUs.title: A Franchise Built On Proven Systems
whyUs.subtitle: Honeyman is one of India's leading honey brands offering 100% pure, raw & organic honey sourced directly from Indian beekeepers.
whyUs.description: Honeyman offers a structured ice-cream franchise backed by in-house products, strong supply chains, and operational expertise. Designed for cities of every size, our models combine differentiation, support, and consistency to help partners build reliable, long-term businesses.

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.subtitle: Honeyman - 2nd Generation with Bees
aboutSection.description1: In 1980, our founder, the late Sardar Jagjit Singh Kapoor, began with a simple belief‚Äîthat purity should never be compromised. What started as a small apiary in Punjab grew into a trusted name across 50+ countries, built on integrity, craftsmanship, and an unwavering respect for nature.
aboutSection.description2: Today, his son, Mr. Shahzada Singh Kapoor‚Äîa globally recognized authority with 30 years in beekeeping and exports‚Äîis channeling that legacy into something revolutionary: India's most trusted refined sugar-free ecosystem.
aboutSection.description3: With over 157+ stores nationwide and a franchise model empowering entrepreneurs across India, Honeyman is more than a brand. It's a movement towards a healthier, guilt-free future.

productsCarousel.title: Honeyman Honey
productsCarousel.description: Harvested from diverse landscapes, crafted with care to deliver purity, aroma, and authentic sweetness.

iceCreamSection.title: Honeyman Ice Cream
iceCreamSection.description: World's first ice cream made only with pure honey. No refined sugar. No guilt. Just rich, creamy indulgence that's as good for you as it tastes.
iceCreamSection.collectionSubtitle: Strawberry ‚Ä¢ Tutti Frutti ‚Ä¢ Mango ‚Ä¢ Blueberry & more

franchiseSection.title: Franchise Models Built To Scale
franchiseSection.description: Own the world's first honey-based ice cream business, designed for various cities, budgets, and ambitions. Our system-driven, product-led model comes fully supported for consistent growth.
franchiseSection.helpText: Have questions? We're here to help you start your franchise journey

giftingSection.title: Gifting Collection
giftingSection.description: Celebrate every moment with gifts that reflect care, quality, and wellness‚Äîbeautifully packaged and sweetened only with nature's purest ingredient.

wedding.name: Wedding
wedding.description: Celebrate new beginnings with elegant hampers of premium honey and gourmet delights that reflect tradition and sweetness.

wellness.name: Wellness
wellness.description: Support health and vitality with honey-powered wellness gifts crafted for everyday nourishment.

honeymanStoreSection.title: Explore Our Complete
honeymanStoreSection.description: While this site showcases our story, heritage, and values, our complete range of premium honey products, delicious spreads, and specialty items are available at our dedicated e-commerce store.
honeymanStoreSection.subtext: Discover all our products, special offers, and exclusive deals on our e-commerce platform.
honeymanStoreSection.tagline: Bringing Premium Honey to Your Doorstep

aboutPage.description1: Rooted in Punjab since 1980, the late
aboutPage.description1Cont: founded HONEYMAN on a commitment to purity, transforming a local apiary into a global leader.
aboutPage.description2Cont: a global honey authority, drives a revolutionary vision: building India's most trusted consumer wellness brand.
aboutPage.mission: The World's Largest Ecosystem of Refined Sugar-Free Products
aboutPage.description3Cont: , sweetened only with pure, natural honey.
aboutPage.visionBold2: the world's largest and most trusted ecosystem of honey-based products,
aboutPage.visionText3: redefining how sweetness is consumed across the globe. From Indian households to international markets, we aim to make honey the universal symbol of health, sustainability, and positive change.
